WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closed for no contact.If you can provide us a list of effects you were referring to as not working we can reopen.
WorkItem.Description: The only spell caster class I could get DoTTick item procs to work with was Boomkin.  The DoTTick spells seem to be missing from Mages, Shadow Priests, and Warlocks.
WorkItem.Summary: item special effect on DoTTick missing several spells

Comments.Message: Is there any specific item that you would need this for?

Phylactery of the Nameless Lich (50360) and its heroic version (50365) both proc specifically from periodic damage:

Equip: Each time one of your spells deals periodic damage, you have a chance to gain 918 spell power for 20 sec.

This would include Fireball's DoT (but not with the glyph, which removes the DoT), Pyroblast's DoT, and of course, Living Bomb.
